name: Running Of The pies
description: In this runner type of game, you play as a Camper who's pursuing after a Camp Counselor, who is nicknamed Disco Stu, to pie him on his final week at iD Tech Summer camps! This game is not affiliated with iD Tech Summer Camps nor is it a product acknowledged by the company. The game and its assets were used for a non-commercial title for campers and counselors to enjoy as a fun game for pure enjoyment.
